list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Optimized memory usage and sensor data retrieval
Implemented better memory management by freeing previously allocated memory. Enhanced sensor data retrieval by preserving measured temperature and humidity data into variables, which simplifies debugging. Also introduced logging for free memory space to track memory usage.

task.summary:
Remove unnecessary .idea files and modify StatusManager.cpp
The .idea files related to the project's IDE settings were deleted as they are not needed for the actual functioning of the project. The StatusManager.cpp file was changed to set the status color to Blue instead of Orange.

Refactor .idea workspace and update main.cpp
Removed unneeded .idea configuration files and restructured workspace.xml. The main.cpp file was also modified, particularly the setup and loop methods for better status management connection handling.

Merge 'getMeasurementPoints' method and improve data measurements
Changed parameter in 'getMeasurementPoints' from mutable to constant, and improved data measurement mechanisms in HDC1080, SCD30CO2 and SGP30VOC classes. Added additional logging for debugging.

Update status messages and connection handling
Refactored code to handle status messages through the Log class instead of directly using the Serial class. This improves error handling and readability of the code. Also added a 'beginConnection' method to begin NTPClient connections when required, rather than beginning at the object's initialization, improving the efficiency of connection management.

Improve error handling and connection management
Refactored status message handling to use the Log class, enhancing code readability. Introduced a 'beginConnection' method for initiating connections as necessary, offering a more efficient management of connections compared to starting upon initialization.

Optimized memory usage and sensor data retrieval
Implemented better memory management by freeing previously allocated memory. Enhanced sensor data retrieval by preserving measured temperature and humidity data into variables, which simplifies debugging. Also introduced logging for free memory space to track memory usage.

MESSAGE.value:
Remove unnecessary .idea files and modify StatusManager.cpp
The .idea files related to the project's IDE settings were deleted as they are not needed for the actual functioning of the project. The StatusManager.cpp file was changed to set the status color to Blue instead of Orange.

Refactor .idea workspace and update main.cpp
Removed unneeded .idea configuration files and restructured workspace.xml. The main.cpp file was also modified, particularly the setup and loop methods for better status management connection handling.

Update SensorPoint structure and improve data measurement
Replaced Point return type with updated SensorPoint in sensor classes' methods. Enhanced data measurement mechanism allow multiple sensor readings. Minor changes implemented in .idea workspace and main.cpp.

Update measure() in sensor classes and adjust InfluxDB write methods
Refactored measure() methods in sensor classes SGP30VOC, SCD30CO2, and HDC1080 to return new SensorPoint structure instead of single Point. Enhanced InfluxDB to support writing multiple points. Other files adjusted to handle these changes.

Merge 'getMeasurementPoints' method and improve data measurements
Changed parameter in 'getMeasurementPoints' from mutable to constant, and improved data measurement mechanisms in HDC1080, SCD30CO2 and SGP30VOC classes. Added additional logging for debugging.

Implement new logging method and connection initiation
Added a new method 'beginConnection' to initiate connections and moved the 'Serial.begin(115200)' to the top of setup function. Additionally, temporarily disabled code blocks that check Wi-Fi status before logging and saving messages.

Update status messages and connection handling
Refactored code to handle status messages through the Log class instead of directly using the Serial class. This improves error handling and readability of the code. Also added a 'beginConnection' method to begin NTPClient connections when required, rather than beginning at the object's initialization, improving the efficiency of connection management.

Improve error handling and connection management
Refactored status message handling to use the Log class, enhancing code readability. Introduced a 'beginConnection' method for initiating connections as necessary, offering a more efficient management of connections compared to starting upon initialization.

Optimized memory usage and sensor data retrieval
Implemented better memory management by freeing previously allocated memory. Enhanced sensor data retrieval by preserving measured temperature and humidity data into variables, which simplifies debugging. Also introduced logging for free memory space to track memory usage.
